summary: "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory" is a beloved children's book by Roald Dahl, published in 1964. It follows Charlie Bucket's adventures in Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory. Dahl got the idea from his school days when chocolate companies sent test treats and tried to steal each other's secrets. The story is full of imaginative machines and characters. It's been made into movies, video games, and stage shows, making it one of the most popular children's stories ever.
title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
